1487380.name: Chora
1487380.description:
"Chora" Is Virtual Reality Zombie Fps Game.

The world has returned to the age of Apocalypse due to the zombie virus outbreak.

You are only one survivor in 'Daejeon' which is city of Science in korea.

Beat the zombies and Turn on the 'Core-tan' and end the zombie apocalypse.


Player has gun to defeat zombies. Enjoy the scenery of 'Daejeon' and Go up to the stage one by one and save the Wolrd.

Experience thrilling shooting, A variety of zombies,

A stage that gives different feelings, Enjoy the scenery of 'Daejeon'.
